channel.title: The next big craze is out
channel.description:
You loved flappy bird for the first 5 seconds, you loved 2048 for the first 20 seconds. Now it's time for a game you won't love at all.
No really. Someone decided to combine Flappy Bird and 2048 to make this game of hell. [url=http://flappy2048.com]Play now[/url]
Things get weird after 2048... [img height=600]http://i.imgur.com/dXWwLNb.png[/img]

I don’t understand… this craze… what am i doing

Read full topic

item.title: The next big craze is out
item.dc:creator: @Flame3 John
item.description:
@Flame3 wrote:

It’s definitely easier than Flappy Bird ever was.
I got to 21 on my first try, I think the hardest part is being able to find the number you need to match when you’re moving forward and the numbers are moving down.

Read full topic

item.title: The next big craze is out
item.dc:creator: @TabbyKiller TabbyKiller
item.description:
@TabbyKiller wrote:

Loveandpower:

okay what the hell am I missing in this game. I press the space bar to jump but how do I line it up just perfect to go through to the number it should.

We make sacred pact. I promise teach 2048 to you, you promise learn. I say. You do. No questions.

Read full topic

item.title: The next big craze is out
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“TabbyKiller, post:16, topic:542478”][quote author=sk8rdude461 link=topic=661356.msg4421060#msg4421060 date=1398448328]

I’d like it more if it didn’t give you the answer

If it didn’t give you the answer? Bro, the answer is literally whatever block you are…

No kidding…

Okay… So how would you play if you didn’t know the next number you were supposed to hit?
Also, you really have to get past 2048 for the game to get hard.
[/quote]
You’re kidding me right? All the game is doing is doubling the number each time. If the game didn’t give you the answer it would be a nice game to see how many numbers you can train yourself to remember or to quickly calculate.

And, I just figured that out.[/quote]
Again, you’re forgetting that this game was built off the concept of 2 games, but merged into 1.
There’s the flappy bird concept: Where you fly through “pipes” and each one gives you 1 point.
Then there’s the 2048 concept: Where you add like numbers to increase the number in hopes to get to 2048 or higher.

It wouldn’t be exactly based on the concept that came with 2048 if you did it that way. Sure it’d be harder (and i guess educational), but it’s not the concept of the 2 games (or more specifically, the game 2048).

Read full topic
item.source: The next big craze is out

item.title: The next big craze is out
item.dc:creator: @TabbyKiller TabbyKiller
item.description:
@TabbyKiller wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:15, topic:542478”][quote author=TabbyKiller link=topic=661356.msg4421059#msg4421059 date=1398448236]

I’d like it more if it didn’t give you the answer

If it didn’t give you the answer? Bro, the answer is literally whatever block you are…

No kidding…
[/quote]
Okay… So how would you play if you didn’t know the next number you were supposed to hit?
Also, you really have to get past 2048 for the game to get hard.[/quote]
You’re kidding me right? All the game is doing is doubling the number each time. If the game didn’t give you the answer it would be a nice game to see how many numbers you can train yourself to remember or to quickly calculate.

And, I just figured that out.

Read full topic
